experiences.role: Senior Data Scientist | Bioinformatics | Postdoctoral Researcher
experiences.location: Max Delbrück Center for Molecular Medicine, Berlin
tasks: Led end-to-end research projects resulting in 2 first-author and 6 co-authored publications like Nature and Nature Methods (200+ citations) in genome structure and gene regulation.

Secured €100,000 research grant, designing and leading an end-to-end project that was presented in international conferences, established collaborations with 3 research institutions and contributed to the field with an open source software application.
Led the data analysis and software development of multi disciplinary teams, resulting in 3 first-author publications in Cell, Nature Genetics, PLOS Comp Bio, with combined impact factor >90.
Developed a novel open source 3D modeling algorithm adopted by 10 international projects.
Instructed 20+ master's students in R/Linux programming, achieving 72% positive feedback score.
Managed the High Performance Computer infrastructure of the University supporting 100+ users
Maintained and developed critical banking applications serving 100+ daily users with 99.9% uptime.
Developed web crawlers which led to the deployment of a high-traffic website in Brazil.
Developed software for an embedded system that served as the foundation for a prototype, which was later commercialized, demonstrating its practical viability and market potential.
